```cmake
set(Eigen3_DIR   	        "/home/qxit-ln-002408/packages/eigen-3.3.9/install/share/eigen3/cmake")
set(PROJ4_DIR           "/home/qxit-ln-002408/packages/proj-6.0.0/install/lib/cmake/proj4")
set(jsoncpp_DIR         "/home/qxit-ln-002408/packages/jsoncpp-1.7.0/install")
set(PCL_DIR             "/home/qxit-ln-002408/packages/pcl-pcl-1.11.1/install/share/pcl-1.11")
set(GTSAM_DIR           "/home/qxit-ln-002408/packages/gtsam-4.0.3/install/lib/cmake/GTSAM")
# set(Glog_DIR            "/home/qxit-ln-002408/packages/glog-master/install/lib/cmake/glog/")

find_package(GTSAM REQUIRED QUIET)
find_package(PROJ4 REQUIRED)
find_package(Eigen3 3.3 REQUIRED)
find_package(PCL REQUIRED QUIET)
find_package(fastcdr REQUIRED)
find_package(fastrtps REQUIRED)

include_directories(
  /home/qxit-ln-002408/packages/spdlog/install/include
  /home/qxit-ln-002408/packages/jsoncpp-1.7.0/install/include
)
link_directories(
  /home/qxit-ln-002408/packages/jsoncpp-1.7.0/install/lib
)

include_directories(
  ${EIGEN3_INCLUDE_DIR}
  ${PCL_INCLUDE_DIRS}
  ${PYTHON_INCLUDE_DIRS}
  ${PROJ4_INCLUDE_DIRS}
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/include
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/include/pub_sub
  # ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/src
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/../util/include
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/../fast_dds/include
  ${jsoncpp_DIR}/include
  # ${STATE_MONITOR_PATH}/include
  ${OB_GINS_PATH}
  ${OB_GINS_PATH}/src/common
  ${OB_GINS_PATH}/src/data_preprocess
  ${OB_GINS_PATH}/src/ob_gins/preintegration
  )
```
